Request canceled. Accounts Security Stax meets the criteria of 740.17(b)(3) (i) security classification of the United States Bureau of Industry and Security. This software uses HTTPS for server communication; symmetric key RSA encryption to temporarily store the user\'s credentials on their own device using Android Keystore; and code obfuscation using DRM. MAP USSD FLOWS Stax will pay you USD $5 - $50 to go through a USSD flow. Get started üó∫Ô∏è MAP USSD FLOWS Stax wants to make digital money available to anyone anywhere offline. To bring Stax to more people in more countries, we need to build a map of all the USSD services in the world. That is why Stax will pay you USD $5-50 to go through any of the USSD flows on the next page. 1. Enter your email so we can pay you.\n2. Choose a USSD flow like ‚Äúcheck balance‚Äù from your bank or mobile money service on the next page.\n3. Go through the USSD flow as normal.\n4. Stax will check the flow.\n5. You get paid.
